confirm_reset_template: Are you sure you want to reset this template? All modifications will be lost.
no_options: No options available, please add on the left.
alert_keep_one: At least one template must be kept.
confirm_delete_template: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.
confirm_delete_bank: Are you sure you want to delete the entire "{{name}}" vocabulary bank?
new_template_content:
### New Template

Start editing your content and use {{variable}} to insert variables.
delete_category_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{name}}"? All vocabulary under this category will be moved to "Other".
app_description: Banana Prompt is a professional AI prompt management tool that supports templating, variable filling, and one-click optimization.
app_sr_title: Banana Prompt - Professional AI Prompt Management and Optimization Tool
author_info: Made by nanobananapro.site | WeChat Official Account: The Wallfacer's Logic | WeChat: nanobana
confirm_clear_all: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone!
confirm_delete_image: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
browser_not_supported: Browser does not support file system access
refresh_desc: Forced update of built-in templates and word libraries, preserving user customizations.
refresh_done_no_conflict: Refresh complete, system content has been updated.
refresh_done_with_conflicts: Refresh completed, preserving the following user changes:
update_available_msg: An official template or phrase library has been updated. Would you like to sync the latest content now?
data_update_available_msg: Official dictionary/template updates are available. We recommend refreshing the page to get the latest content.
app_update_available_msg: New app version available. We recommend refreshing the page to access the latest features.
import_shared_desc: Do you want to import the shared template "{{name}}"?
author: Author
system_template_readonly: * System template author cannot be modified
copy_failed: Copy failed, please try token sharing
share_token_copied: Share token copied, send it to your friends!
special_thanks: Special thanks to the original author:
wechat_friendly: WeChat-friendly, less likely to be blocked
manual_copy_hint: Cannot auto-copy? Please manually long-press to copy the link:
credits_based_on: This project is based on the open-source project PromptFill.
credits_thanks: Special thanks to the original author:
manifesto_text: Built for creators. All data stays local; we never upload your prompts.
tap_to_view_details: Tap or swipe up to view details
footer_brand_desc: A professional AI image prompt library designed for Nano Banana. Browse curated templates, customize with variables, and generate stunning AI images.
